bib.title: Recommendation framework for online social networks
bib.author: Kazienko, Przemys{\l}aw and Musia{\l}, Katarzyna
bib.venue: Advances in Web Intelligence and Data Mining
bib.abstract: The recommendation framework that supports the creation of new interpersonal relationships within the social networks is presented in the paper. It integrates many sources of data in order to generate the relevant personalized recommendations for network members. The unique social filtering techniques and measures of the activity and strength of relationship are encompassed by the framework.
bib.booktitle: Advances in Web Intelligence and Data Mining
